title: Incompatibility between torch.sum on Tensor and cuda.FloatTensor
body_html:
When I sum over a dimension of a Tensor, the dimension of the output is the
same whereas with a cuda Tensor the dimension is reduced by one.

Shouldn't these outputs agree?

E.g.

torch.sum(x) # x torch.FloatTensor
torch.FloatTensor of size 1x2x512

torch.sum(y) # y torch.cuda.FloatTensor
torch.cuda.FloatTensor of size 2x512 (GPU 0)
